Commands.Snap Punch: 5-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants Small Attack Up and Small Speed Up for 3 turns.
Commands.Touch of Death: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Grants a medium probability of poisoning the target for 3 turns.
Commands.Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn.  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Tornado Kick: 4-HIT melee BRV+HP attack + 1-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  BRV stolen can overflow up to 180% Max BRV   When using 「Snap Punch+」:  - Grants 1 stack of 「Greased Lightning」 (max is 1)   「Greased Lightning」 has the following effects:  - Slightly raises Attack  - Turns 「Tornado Kick」 to 「Tornado Kick+」
Commands.Tornado Kick+: 4-HIT melee BRV+HP attack + 1-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  BRV stolen can overflow up to 200% Max BRV  Consumes 1 stack of 「Greased Lightning」

Passives.Antibody: Moderately raises resistance to Poison and reduces the probability of getting it.
Passives.Snap Punch Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Snap Punch.
Passives.Ability Speed High: Slightly reduces Action Delay when using abilities continuously.
Passives.Touch of Death Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Touch of Death.
Passives.Touch of Death Charge: Increases the max uses of Touch of Death by 1.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Snap Punch Charge: Increases the max uses of Snap Punch by 1.
Passives.Greased Lightning: Slightly raises Attack and Speed for 4 turns when the battle starts
Passives.Buff Boost: Moderately increases Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Snap Punch Extend: While buffed:- Turns  BRV Attack  to  BRV Attack+  with the following effects: + Increases number of BRV hits to 6 + Tremendously raises total BRV potency + Deals critical hits when attacking an enemy not targeting self + Lowers Action Delay- Turns  HP Attack  to  HP Attack+  with the following effects: + Raises BRV based on Attack before inflicting a 1-HIT melee BRV+HP attack + Deals critical hits when attacking an enemy not targeting self + BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV + Lowers Action DelayWhen using  Snap Punch :- Tremendously raises BRV potency- Moderately improves  Attack Up  and  Speed Up - Deals critical hits when attacking an enemy not targeting self- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV- Grants  Medium Max BRV Up  for 5 turnsAfter using  BRV Attack+  or  HP Attack+ , turns  Snap Punch  to  Snap Punch+  with the following effects:- Tremendously raises BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 180% Max BRV- Turns back to  Snap Punch  after use
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Touch of Death Extend: When using  Touch of Death :- Increases number of BRV hits to 2- Tremendously raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Converts 10% of HP damage dealt to BRV- Moderately improves  Poison - Inflicts  Sap  for 6 turns- Triggers an HP attack after use
Passives.Radiance of Bravery and Power: Raises Initial BRV and Attack by 20%.
Passives.Attack Up Extend: When using Attack Up, adds the following effect:- Slightly raises Max BRV.

Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Increases the max uses of Attack Up by 1.Extends the duration of its effects by 1 turn.
Weapons.Sudarshana Chakra CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Tornado Kick Grants special effect  Greased Lightning
Weapons.Hellish Claw CP: 35: Increases the potency of Touch of Death and lowers its Action Delay.Raises the success rate of Poison and extends its duration.Extends all granted buffs by 1 turn.
Weapons.Sphairai CP: 15: Increases the potency of Snap Punch.Extends the duration of Attack Up and Speed Up.
